User.nn package¶

Submodules¶

User.nn.NonlinearNetwork module¶

class User.nn.NonlinearNetwork.NeuralNetwork¶

基类：Module

add_layer(layer: Module)¶
forward(x)¶
class User.nn.NonlinearNetwork.NonlinearNetwork(set_layers: list[Behaviour | Layer2Layer | Linear] = None)¶

基类：Module

A Nonlinear_Network is a Module that consists of multiple layers of TDOR.Behaviour.

add_layer(layer: Behaviour | Layer2Layer | Linear)¶
backward(loss_value: ndarray, lr: float = 0.01) → None¶

This function calculates the gradients of the loss function with respect to the parameters of the network.

参数:

  • lr – learning rate

  • loss_value

返回:

self._network_grad: A dictionary containing the gradients of the loss function with respect to the parameters of the network.

forward(x)¶
property get_output¶
layers: list[Behaviour | Layer2Layer | Linear] = [Behaviour()]¶
lr: float = 0.01¶
step() → None¶

This function updates the parameters of the network using the gradients calculated in the backward function.

返回:

None

User.nn.TDOR module¶

class User.nn.TDOR.Behaviour(input_dim=2, output_dim=2, delta: float = 0.01)¶

基类：Module

This is a template class for the behaviour of 2D1R.

action(x: ndarray) → ndarray¶

pass the input through the weights.

Param:

beta = -3.2944 * alpha + 42.59

Param:

alpha -> weight,

参数:

x – np.ndarray((1, input_dim)), a row vector of input

返回:

1E-6 * alpha * ((torch.exp(beta * x) - 1))

backward(loss_value: float) → ndarray¶

Get the gradient from the derivative of the loss w.r.t. the output of the layer Deliver the gradient to the previous layer.

参数:

loss_value

返回:

None

property dy_dx¶
forward(x: ndarray) → ndarray¶
property get_output¶
set_loss_value(*args, **kwargs)¶
small_signal(x: ndarray)¶

pass the input through the weights to get the small signal approximation of the derivative.

参数:

x

返回:

None

step() → None¶

update the weights according to the small signal approximation of the derivative.

参数:

any

返回:

None

property type¶
class User.nn.TDOR.Layer2Layer(input_dim=1, output_dim=1)¶

基类：Module

This is a template class for the layer-to-layer connection of 2D1R.

scaling(x: ndarray) → ndarray¶

pass the input through the weights.

参数:

x

返回:

class User.nn.Behaviour(input_dim=2, output_dim=2, delta: float = 0.01)¶

基类：Module

This is a template class for the behaviour of 2D1R.

action(x: ndarray) → ndarray¶

pass the input through the weights.

Param:

beta = -3.2944 * alpha + 42.59

Param:

alpha -> weight,

参数:

x – np.ndarray((1, input_dim)), a row vector of input

返回:

1E-6 * alpha * ((torch.exp(beta * x) - 1))
